website_summaries.verdict: Sensitive formula that is perfect for all skin types at an affordable price point.
pros: Designed to provide all-day moisture to skin that is stressed out and dry
94% of customers had more hydrated, better looking skin in eight weeks
Reduces the appearance of fine lines
Contains ingredients found in products that are twice as expensive
cons: Customers with very oily skin found the thicker consistency to be problematic

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Philosophy product!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is a lifesaver. I'm not one that can use a lot of lotion on my face. It makes my oily. I'm a huge Philosophy fan and they're products have been life changing. However I've never found a Philosophy lotion that is adaquate for me. I can apply this at night and feel moisturized during the day. I no longer need a day time lotion. It's the perfect amount of moisture. A pat or two of my fingers is enough for my entire face therefore making the container last forever. It does have a perfume smell but it's tolerable and fades fast.
customer_reviews.author: TheMacDonalds

customer_reviews.title: Works, but VERY strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Product made my skin feel very soft almost immediately, however, I returned because product has a very strong smell. Usually I can tolerate smells but it lingered so long that I eventually got a headache. I was sad because I felt like it made my skin very smooth but I could not get past the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this moisturizer! I have very sensitive skin and a fine balance between over moisturized and under moisturized. I have bought many items to find what works but this will without a doubt be my go to product and would 100% buy again
customer_reviews.author: Holly crosby

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and non greasy. I wouldn't recommend this product for very dry skin but it you want to use it for wrinkles etc. then follow up with a thicket night cream it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Claire

customer_reviews.title: My moisturizer jar was 30% empty!!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: My moisturizer jar was 30% empty!!!!! I discovered it only when the jar was left lying on the side and the product inside had moved! It appears that it was full of air! I have preciously purchased this same item from Sephora twice and never had such issue. It's very disappointing and I won't be purchasing from here again
customer_reviews.author: lilush_beep

customer_reviews.title: Best Night Cream EVER
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely glad that I tried this, it has been what I had been looking for a night cream. I have ver sensitive skin and have had no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Mme

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good night cream for my dry skin. It's very light but provide lots of moisture. Not oily and has a very light pleasant smell. I've been using it for a month now and I see the difference already. My skin looks healthy and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: It's my philosophy!
customer_reviews.text: Just found philosophy last month. What a difference in my skin! It's soft and glows now. Oh and my fine lines already gone. IDK if it's because if just this or because I'm using the dew serum and the firming serum with it, but it's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer, but the scent was just way too much. It smells like I just rubbed perfume all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Machado

customer_reviews.title: Luv this Philosophy product!
customer_reviews.text: Philosophy discontinued my favorite night cream much to my dismay. This one is equally as good and at a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Paula H

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a product that is not greasy and really moisturizes my skin at night.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I used it until it was gone and am going to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get past the scent
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer has lasted me several months and I am nearing the end of my jar. I have decided not to repurchase it because of the flowery/perfumey smell. My skin hasn't had any amazing changes, however my face is hydrated in the morning. It does it's job but I can find something else that does the same thing, minus the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will always use this !! Amazon has best price!
customer_reviews.text: Nighttime moisturizer- my skin drinks it up and it works perfectly for my dry ski - even in summer with the humidity! I still need it and it’s nit greasy at all:)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my philosophy. This night cream is so thick. I’ve been using their products for years. What a difference in my skin. Bonus....not tested on animals!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Willard

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I have definitely noticed a difference in the wrinkles under and on the sides of my eyes and on my lower face on the side of my mouth. I use this cream nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Mushalansky

customer_reviews.title: It makes my face feel better, not so very dry
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night! It makes my face feel better, not so very dry!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: enjoy being able to save a few dollars when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used Philosophy products for years...enjoy being able to save a few dollars when I find it on Amazon. Really wonderful skin products-!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kyne

customer_reviews.title: My face cream is brown
customer_reviews.text: This is only January and my cream is turning beige do i still use it
customer_reviews.author: debra williams

customer_reviews.title: Didn't smell/feel like previous Philosophy creams
customer_reviews.text: I hate to leave a review for this product based on an Amazon purchase because this brand has always been a reputable one. But this is not the first time I've purchased a cosmetic on here where it just didn't look/smell like it should. I would honestly just spend the extra money and buy it in the store.
customer_reviews.author: NYer523

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Cream
customer_reviews.text: I tried a sample of this night cream from Sephora and liked it a lot. Now that I'm using it all the time, the texture of my skin is smoother and it feels nicely moisturized. I can usually tell if a night cream is good when I rinse my face in the morning. If I can still sort of feel it on my skin when I rinse, I know it has stayed put and done its job. Great for skin like mine - fine lines and starting to age - I am 59.
customer_reviews.author: Ktm

customer_reviews.title: Strong fragrance - if you don't mind that kind of thing, buy this. If you do mind, move along
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it for night time yet, but it made the back of my hands nice and soft. Good for you, Philosophy. For me personally, I'd give it 2 stars because it has a fragrance that I don't like. Sort of a combo of citrus and flower and something else that makes my throat want to close up. I don't like fragranced things in general though. If I didn't mind the smell, I'd give it 4 stars. I'll try it for tonight and see if it the smell drives me bonkers. Given that I want to cut my hands off from my body right now to escape the smell, I'm not optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: V. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like renewed hope in jar, so I thought I’d try the night version. It’s really great for my skin and makes my face glow. Unfortunately, it’s super think and leaves my face feeling super moist into the morning, even when I don’t use much. That being said, it does moisturize incredibly well. I don’t know if I just don’t like night cream or is this one is especially thick.
customer_reviews.author: brainsrpains

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Doesn’t feel heavy on my face and it completely soaks in. No oil. UPDATE: After using this almost everyday I am just about to finish the jar after over a year. If you have dry skin that feels tight after cleansing you NEED this. My face instantly feels soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor S

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my acne-prone skin! I never feel greasy after applying this. They’ve won me over!

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS. IT is thick
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS. IT is thick, creamy, lasts several months with daily use and is very moisturizing! It's the middle of winter and my skin is nice and supple.
customer_reviews.author: Shazza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Recently tried other products..less expensive.. will not stray from Philosophy again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B.

customer_reviews.title: Love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this too much. Smells wonderful and is so great on my skin.

customer_reviews.title: FEELS NICE ON YOUR SKIN
customer_reviews.text: ONLY USED FOR A SHORT TIME, BUT LOVE HOW NICE IT MAKES YOUR SKIN FEEL. NOT GREASY, JUST A MOIST FEELING THAT LASTS UNTIL MORNING AND LONGER.
customer_reviews.author: BARRY LISTON

customer_reviews.title: Meh...there are better options
customer_reviews.text: This cream is definitely not as thick or moIsturizing as other brands, which is what I need. Would be good for someone who only needs a light moisturizer. The scent is exactly the same as the dry shampoo, which doesn’t bother me like others have said.
customer_reviews.author: Akoboe

customer_reviews.title: and it make my skin just look like it had less pores
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this not expecting much but oh my goodness, I have lines under my eyes and this just smoothed them out, and it make my skin just look like it had less pores. The jar lasted me a good 5 months because a little does go a long way. I thoroughly enjoyed this product
